name: Broken Tank Racing
description:
Your tank is broken and can't drive, so race around the course by launching yourself with explosions!

Mouse - Aim

Left Click - Fire

Esc - Detach mouse cursor from game

Click the game if the cursor doesn't automatically lock to the game.

Free assets used:

Shotgun Old School - RA The Sun God - soundbible.com

Bomb - Mike Koenig - soundbible.com

ColorSkies - NightSoundGames - Unity Asset Store

Seamless Textures (Realistic) - 2kPixel Studios - Unity Asset Store

Made with Unity.
